channel.title: Loading bigger cache
channel.description: I am doing a PI atm, and I am adding my cache by my self, I have the 562 cache from runescape, but how do I add, along with the models and such?

item.title: Loading bigger cache
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

The Wanderer:

Then why are you loading a higher cache if you want it to be a 317?

Because after noticing how much a pain in the ass it is to load a higher cache, I might not, im still deciding tho…

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Loading bigger cache
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

^Good idea, but I plan to keep this server as a 317, maybe add a coustom or two, re-write a few skills… Add some cool stuff, then release…

Read full topic

item.title: Loading bigger cache
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:421497”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=524160.msg3814150#msg3814150 date=1321175160]
… It isn’t labeled item.cfg. Should be labeled like…
main_file_cache.dat
main_file_cache.idx0
main_file_cache.idx1
and so on. May have more or different names. They are simply archives of the models and stuff in a encrypted format.
[/quote]
I’m aware of that, I do have the 562 cache with all those files… I meant item.cfg as the server sided one, it handles the stats of the items.[/quote]
Ah. All you would need is a dump. Search for like 562 item data dumps or something along those lines. You could also just download a 562 server and steal their item definitions.

Read full topic

item.title: Loading bigger cache
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

The Wanderer:

Cache should come with the models. That’s the point of loading higher revision caches is for the models/anims/interfaces and such.

Oh… well my cache does not have that… any idea where I can get a 508 - 562 cache with models and item.cfg and all that?

Read full topic
